description: Lightweight fully featured Rust implementation of Bitwarden.

instructions.start: This is a Bitwarden server API implementation written in Rust compatible with upstream Bitwarden clients, perfect for self-hosted deployment where running the official resource-heavy service might not be ideal.
instructions.end: Bitwarden_rs is deployed and available as $$cap_appname. Please give it a few minutes to boot, otherwise you will see a 502 error.

variables.label: Bitwarden_rs Version
variables.description: Check out their Docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/r/bitwardenrs/server/tags
